detailsData.title: Proven Success
detailsData.content: For over 20 years, Duffy & Duffy has secured close to $1 Billion dollars in verdicts and settlements, showcasing their expertise and commitment to their clients.

detailsData.title: Expert Team
detailsData.content: The firm boasts a team of skilled trial lawyers with years of experience in litigating and resolving negligence claims, ensuring knowledgeable and effective representation.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Practice
detailsData.content: Duffy & Duffy offers a wide range of practice areas including Medical Malpractice, Nursing Home Abuse, Personal Injury, and more, catering to various legal needs.

detailsData.title: Client-Centric Approach
detailsData.content: Understanding the importance of their clients' struggles, Duffy & Duffy fights for the absolute best outcome, prioritizing justice and compensation for the victims.

subHeading: Skilled Long Island Lawyers Helping Injury Victims Seek Justice
valueProp: For over 20 years we have helped thousands of clients navigate challenging legal situations across Medical Malpractice, Nursing Home Negligence, Personal Injury & other areas of practice. Our law firm proudly represents communities throughout New York with a focus on our local community in Long Island and New York City. Throughout our history we have secured close to $1 Billion dollars in verdicts and settlements.

testimonalData.text: Thank you for persevering for so long to reach a favorable outcome for Victor. Your expertise and commitment to his case is really appreciated. It is a tremendous weight off our shoulders to know that Victor will be able to live his life reasonably and comfortably.

Winning the case has replaced the lost income and retirement benefits. From the very first meeting with you, I was treated with respect and compassion. The staff was always professional and dedicated. We are very grateful and thankful to your firm for all the effort and care you took to present and win my case.

I would recommend your law firm for nursing home neglect to anyone in a similar situation. I can’t bring my mother back but as Judge Feinman said to me after we settled the case this afternoon “hopefully Oceanside Care will learn a lesson from this for future residents in their facility.
